text: The fourth season of Arrested Development will be released again — as a remix. Creator Mitch Hurwitz revealed on social media that he ’ s recut the entire season and will be releasing it on Netflix as Arrested Development Season 4 Remix : Fateful Consequences. The original Season 4 focused on one character per episode. “ The goal was that by the end of the season a unified story of cause and effect would emerge for the viewer — full of surprises about how the Bluths were responsible for most of the misery they had endured, ” Hurwitz wrote.
